author: kmcdermo
body:
Title really says it all.  This PR is to add in some shower shape variables present in gedPhotons but currently not included in standard photons.  This producer is to be used for the out-of-time photons collection (as in PR #18844).

Mostly this is just a copy/paste of code from GEDPhotonProducer (editing where necessary).
title: Add protection to zero size rechits in PhotonProducer, include more shower shape variables
